name: repair_item
attributes: # [doc = " 耐久度を回復し、費用を徴収するが、"]
# [doc = " item_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let item = & mut ctx . accounts . item_account ;
item . durability = item . durability . checked_add (restore_amount as u64) . unwrap () ;
let cost = (restore_amount as u64) . checked_mul (cfg . cost_per_point) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= cost ;
* * ctx . accounts . treasury . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += cost ;

fields.name: item_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して照合チェックを入れるべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 回復を実行するユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: treasury
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 徴収した費用を受け取る口座"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 回復コスト設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このアイテムを所有するユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: cost_per_point
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 回復 1 ポイントあたりのコスト（Lamports）"]
